website_summaries.verdict: A small scale with a display that can stretch 2 feet away from your package for easy reading.
pros: Comes with an AC adapter or can run on batteries
Works well for people sending out a lot of packages
Front display can either attach to the scale, or detach for distance reading
Backlit display makes it easier to read
Includes a holder to help measure tubes and letters
cons: This model doesn't have a continuous read to allow you to see weight changes as you add them

customer_reviews.title: May not include correct power supply
customer_reviews.text: Scale works well with batteries but the included power supply is makes for 3v and the decal on the scale says it requires 9-12v. If you're looking to buy this scale I would buy the version without the power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lechowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great scale for someone who does occasional shipping of larger items.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale because I shipped some larger items occasionally, and some were 35 or more pounds, and large. The nice detachable control panel helps with those larger items, and it seems to be pretty accurate right out of the box. I'm not going to review the features for you, but for the average ebay-er or home retailer, this works fine for getting your stuff out there. Works with envelopes as well, so you can pretty much do your posting from home if you are sending things out via USPS. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: 721trucker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Very good product. Simple, precise and perfect size. I rightly recommend this scale. It was exactly what I was looking for sell my stuff on EBay.
customer_reviews.author: coimbra.ny

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This scale works perfectly. It runs through a calibration routine every time it is turned on and is lighted and easy to read. Much better than my old scale.
customer_reviews.author: B Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Postal Scale and More!
customer_reviews.text: It does everything it is supposed to do and more. I bought to weigh shipping of items for my in house business. Now I'm using it in the kitchen and weighing food. Because the scale can switch from pounds to ounces to grams to kilo's at just the push of a button I find i am using it a lot more than just for shipping weight. Great scale and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse Princeton-Common

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Support from MyWeigh
customer_reviews.text: I contacted My Weigh multiple times for information on setting this scale to stay on until turned off (we rapidly ship many packages using a system that imports the shipping address -- the scale often turns off before the information imports and we are constantly turning it on and off). The company has never responded to my emails or online contact requests. Having said that the customer support is non-existent, the scale itself works great. We purchased it as a replacement for an earlier model that just wore out (that one did stay on until turned off!).
customer_reviews.author: Jeri M.

customer_reviews.title: I only bought this model because i had such good experience with the same model i had previously used ...
customer_reviews.text: works, but doesn't read continuously if your using it to mix liquids it makes large jumps in the weight readout making it difficult. I only bought this model because i had such good experience with the same model i had previously used before it died.
customer_reviews.author: Jaron Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and has an updated display.
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version of this scale that I purchased about 6 years ago. It gave up the Ghost when it fell off the shipping table, but it gave many years of valuable service. The new scale looks identical, but they finally put a backlight in the display so that you can read it in dim light conditions or when you are trying to read the display at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: MTS

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scale for some time now, and it works great for everything I need. When my old scale went out I was dreading having to pay a lot of money for a new scale, but this scale does the trick and it was cheap!
customer_reviews.author: LMNOP.Inc

customer_reviews.title: great machine. we have several of these they work ...
customer_reviews.text: great machine. we have several of these they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandig

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. When I need to weigh a box quickly I just plug it in and it's good to go. The front detaches and pulls away so you can weigh big boxes on the scale and still read the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Same scale sold on various track equipment sites/magazines.. way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: sphome

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Opened up package, plugged in scale, does not turn on. Currently useless...
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value/Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of equipment. Accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Koala

customer_reviews.title: The best scale for the price range.
customer_reviews.text: Quality scale for the price. It's accurate and has been in use for over one year.
customer_reviews.author: Breese

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: love this scale, easy to use and love the detachable digital display.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied. Would recommend and will purchase in the future
customer_reviews.text: It is what I ordered, very satisfied. Would recommend and will purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Finney

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER CORD INCLUDED.....what the *#@$*^@?
customer_reviews.text: NO POWER CORD even though one is pictured. I guess when I buy a device that runs on electricity I expect there to be a power cord. Yes, it also runs on batteries but I use the scale quite a bit and replacing 4 C batteries is not what I want to do. I am replacing an Ultraship 50 which worked very well for several years until it died. It came with a power cord. Expect to pay another $10-15 for the cord if I can find one that is compatible. I wish I could weigh in on how this scale works but I don't have the power. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ABC123

customer_reviews.title: This scale works well and has a nice removable face for larger items
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scale to be used as both a kitchen scale and as a postal scale for our small business. It has been accurate and reliable thus far. The removable face makes weighing larger items easier. I generally use it with batteries for convenience but do also have the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse 727

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have a small skincare company. Even though I have brutalized the scale, it has survived. I highly recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Device works great! Easy to use. Received quickly and as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bivin

product_meta.title: My Weigh Ultraship 55 Postal Scale in Black with Power Supply Adapter
product_meta.description:
The My Weigh Ultraship Digital Scale is the perfect scale for any home or office for weights up to 55 pounds. From weighing foods, to postcards, letters, parcels, envelopes, mailing tubes, padded packs, small boxes, medium boxes or even large boxes, this scale can handle it all. Its dual range design allows allows it to accurately weigh light letters and heavier packages, meaning you no longer need a scale for heavier and lighter objects. The UltraShip has a programmable auto-off which allows you to set the scale to never turn off automatically after a set amount of time. Additionally, My Weigh Ultraship 55 features an attachable letter and envelope holder, mailing tube holder, patented detachable faceplate on long 2-foot flex cord, HOLD feature, programmable auto-off feature, extra large buttons, improved accuracy, improved durability, more modes, digital auto calibration, and longer battery life.Now combined with My Weigh Ultraship Power Supply Adapter at Lifestyle by Focus for a practical alternative to batteries.

Scale Specifications

 * Power:
 * 4 C batteries (not included)AC adapter (not included)
 * Display: Blue backlit, remote
 * Tare feature: Yes
 * Calibration feature: Yes
 * Hold feature: Yes
 * Count feature: No
 * Platform size: 8″ x 6.25″
 * Scale size: 8.9″ x 8.1″ x 2.8″
 * Weighing modes: 4

Power Supply Specifications

 * Input: 100-240VAC, 50/60Hz 0.2A
 * Output: 9V, 300mA
 * Certification: UL
 * Country of Origin: Made in China
 * Model: IVP0900-0300W
feature_bullets: MODES: Four weighing modes: oz, lb, g, and kg
FEATURES: Tare, hold and programmable auto on/off feature
POWER: AC adapter or battery powered
INCLUDES: Letter and envelope holder and mailing tube holder

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
